page.title: 08POPULATION FORRES WEST
page.content: Population of this area is divided between the town of Forres and the rural areas. The people either live on housing estates in town or on farms. In {isolated areas}where farming is an {essential}- part of making a living. In our area the three main housing estates are { {Pilmuir, Thornhill }and {Burdshaugh.} In the {rural areas}there are two main villages called {Broom of Moy}and { {Kintesssack.}There are ten farms and stately houses. The population in { {urban}and{rural}areas around Forres is forever increasing. The main reason for this is because of a{ Royal Air {Force Station}at{Kinloss}whose occupants sometimes move to Forres to buy privately owned houses. Another reason is on the coast of the Moray Firth there lies an oil rig making company.
